Text.name: Text0
Text.content: The modified list will be displayed as default and contains pages that have recently been modified in the sitemap editor. When you move the mouse over a list entry, an option appears on the right side of the bar, which shows an option to display the page in the sitemap editor. If clicked, the overlay window is closed and the selected page will show up blinking in the editor.

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: This list holds all pages that had been deleted from the sitemap without publishing the deletion. Moving the mouse over a list entry will reveal an Undelete option at the right side of the bar, restoring the original state of the resource before it was deleted.
